Arizona Monsoon Intensifies: Flash Flooding and Severe Thunderstorms Possible
According to the Arizona Weatherman, today will be the apex of monsoon moisture this round, with a tapering off of the monsoon activity over the next few days, 16-18 July 2025. However, yesterday saw a strong monsoon surge, with many places, especially in southern Arizona, receiving 1-2 inches of rain. Tucson, Oro Valley, Tombstone, and Benson were hit hard, including central Pima County and southern Pinal County. Sorry, western Arizona and central Phoenix. For Today, 16 July, expect a bigger push of moisture up on the Mogollon Rim. This article will break down the next few days of what to expect for the upcoming Arizona Monsoon storm pattern.

Meet The Two Bonded Shih Tzu Mixes Who Are Searching For Love Together
Great Dog Rescue New England (GDRNE), a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Sam and Gabby, a bonded pair of Shih Tzu mixes who have spent their entire lives together. According to the rescue, “Sam and Gabby had an owner that loved them, and it shows.” The reason for these two ending up in rescue care was not provided, but one thing is clear: They need a home where they can remain together. Now living with a loving foster family, these inseparable companions are ready to enter the next part of their lives together.

Puppy Rescued After Surviving 24 Hours in River After Being Thrown From Bridge
Great Dog Rescue New England (GDRNE), a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Jaxxon Rain, a young puppy who recently survived a near-death experience. According to GDRNE, “This sweet boy was rescued in Mississippi after he had been thrown over a bridge and into the river.” Rescuers found Jaxxon clinging onto a pile a brush in the middle of the river, where he had reportedly been for over 24 hours. The rescue went on to enthuse, “We're so happy we found him when we did! He is one tough cookie.” After surviving such a scary situation, Jaxxon is now able to rest easy in safety and comfort at his new foster home.

Massachusetts-based Sandy Paws Rescue Inc., a licensed 501(c)(3) nonprofit dog rescue, has issued an urgent call for foster homes for dogs who are in need of a place to call home until their forever family finds them.

Meet Cutie: The Little 10lb "Chiweenie" Searching For Love
Great Dog Rescue New England (GDRNE), a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Cutie, a tiny 3-year-old Chihuahua and Dachshund mix pup who is ready and waiting to meet her forever family. Until recently, this small girl was living on her own as a stray in Tennessee, just trying to find enough food each day. “She was wandering alone down a dark street one night,” says GDRNE when describing how Cutie came into their care. “We aren't sure what her story is, but we are happy we found her when we did and hopefully can help her write her next chapter with a loving family!” Now living in the safety of a caring foster home, Cutie has since been thriving.

Scituate Animal Shelter of Massachusetts recently introduced a special young cat looking for her forever home. Virginia, described as a sweet, lovable lady who is "super fun and just adores all humans," has had quite the journey since arriving at the shelter in March. Virginia's story began with an unfortunate start, as she arrived with an unknown wound that required a four-month quarantine period. "While we gave her lots of love, this social butterfly couldn't wait to break free!" the shelter shared.
